title: A Little memory
creator_credit: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
creator_credit_for_label: Truyen Dinh Le, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
